Key Match Events: Jake Bauers hit a game-ending single in the ninth inning to lift the NL Central-clinching Brewers to a 2-1 win over the Phillies
Post-Match Reflections: Milwaukee clinched its second straight division title and made the playoffs for the sixth time in the last seven seasons
Miscellaneous Highlights: The teams struck out 28 times combined. Philadelphia batters struck out 16 times Tuesday and 16 times Wednesday
Others: Aaron Nola, second in the NL in innings pitched, went seven innings, allowing one run on three hits while striking out nine and walking one. He had given up 10 earned runs in nine innings in his previous two starts
